import vtktools import numpy
file = vtktools.vtu('swe_tidal_flow_regular_bed_1.vtu') file.GetFieldNames()
L = 14000.0 t = 10000.0 x = numpy.linspace(0, L, 1000)
H = 50.5 - 40*x/L - 10*numpy.sin(numpy.pi*(4*x/L - 0.5)) h_analytical = H + 4 - 4*numpy.sin(numpy.pi*(4*t/86400.0 + 0.5)) ux_analytical = ((x - 14000.0)*numpy.pi/(5400.0*h_analytical))*numpy.cos(numpy.pi*(4*t/86400.0 + 0.5))
ux = numpy.zeros(len(ux_analytical)) for i in range(len(ux)): ux[i] = vtktools.vtu.ProbeData(file, numpy.array([[x[i], 500, 0]]), 'Velocity')[0][0]
ux_difference = abs(ux_analytical - ux)
import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files
